# Brew Azorius
<br/>

**Aliases**: `UW Brew`


**Dominant mana**: <img src="../resources/images/mana/U.png" class="dominant-mana-icon"/> <img src="../resources/images/mana/W.png" class="dominant-mana-icon"/>

**Type**: `Aggro`/`Midrange`/`Control`/`Combo`

**Description**: 
Generic archetype, for Azorius decks that do not fit those in the [Archetypes Index](../../pages/archetypes_index.html).
